items.title: Grok restricted in Malaysia as X fails to implement safeguards
items.summary: The Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) has directed a temporary restriction on Grok‘s artificial intelligence chatbot in Malaysia, effective today, 11 January 2026. This comes after repeated misuse of Grok’s AI tool to generate harmful content. According to MCMC, the action was taken after Grok was repeatedly used to generate obscene, sexually explicit, indecent, […]

items.title: Instagram “Reset your Password” Email: Is there a Data Breach at Meta?

It was alleged that this could be an indication that there’s a data breach at Meta where personal data […]

In this first 2026 edition of 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly, we’re highlighting a fresh batch of notable deals on gaming monitors, keyboards, and other essential peripherals, kicking off the new year with solid savings. There are also some compelling offers surfacing on Windows Copilot+ PCs, with several models dropping to new lows or matching their best prices to date. Whether you’re mapping out a full battlestation overhaul for the new year or eyeing a relatively simple upgrade to your current setup, this week’s roundup delivers plenty of deals worth a closer look. We’ll also briefly touch on a few standout gear that caught our eye at CES this year, including Razer’s Project AVA and even Anker’s 45W Nano charger with a smart display. items.title: Bluetti’s New Year Sale takes up to 53% off power stations and bundles + exclusive bonus savings – all from $119
items.summary:
Running alongside the winter backup deals we spotted, Bluetti also has an ongoing New Year Sale with up to 53% discounts across its power stations, bundles, and accessories. One notable return is the new Elite 400 Portable Power Station at $1,221.06 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS6OFF at checkout, beating out its Amazon pricing by $78. Having been released back in November with an original $2,999 MSRP, the price has since been cut to $2,699 when at full directly from Bluetti’s website, whereas it starts from $1,899 at Amazon. We saw Black Friday and Christmas sales take this model lowest to $1,299, with exclusive savings giving us this same rate we’re seeing again here. You’ll be getting $678 off the going rate during this event ($1,478 off the MSRP) and another shot at the lowest price we have tracked so far. Head below to also browse the full lineup of deals while they’re sticking around.
